org.baswell.httproxy
Class HttpRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.baswell.httproxy.HttpMessage
      org.baswell.httproxy.HttpRequest

public class HttpRequest
extends HttpMessage

A proxied HTTP request. The request sent back to the client can be modified in ProxyDirector.onRequestStart(HttpRequest).

Field Summary
 java.lang.String clientIp
          The client IP address this request came from.
 boolean firstInExchange
          Is this request the first in the exchange (multiple requests & responses can be processed over the same connection).

          The HTTP method (ex.
 boolean overSSL
          Was the request received over a SSL connection.
 java.lang.String path
          The HTTP path requested.
 java.lang.String version
          The HTTP version of this request.

getHost

public java.lang.String getHost()
Returns:
The value of the Host header or null if not Host header is present.

getUserAgent

public java.lang.String getUserAgent()
Returns:
The value of the User-Agent header or null if not User-Agent header is present.

getCookies

public java.util.List<HttpCookie> getCookies()
Returns:
Parse and return all cookies contain in the headers of this request.
